item.title: 国家推动贷款增长，惠誉警告越南银行面临风险
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）警告说，越南银行的快速贷款步伐正在助长风险，当政府取消长期实行的信贷配额制度时，风险可能会增加。【原文：Vietnam’s banks rapid pace of lending is fueling risks, which could increase when the government removes a long-standing credit quota system, Fitch Ratings warned.】

item.title: 意大利力量铜博士学会一门新手艺
item.description:
一些长期存在的经济假设正在被颠覆。【原文：

A couple of longstanding economic assumptions are being upended.

item.title: 香港投资公司 2024 年回报率达 20 亿港元
item.description: 香港投资公司 2024 年的投资收入超过 20 亿港元（2.6 亿美元），主要得益于首次公开募股和对生物技术公司的押注。【原文：Hong Kong Investment Corp. generated more than HK$2 billion ($260 million) in investment income in 2024, boosted by initial public offerings and bets on biotechnology firms.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦警告业绩可能令人失望，Pop Mart 股价下跌
item.description: 在伯恩斯坦公司（Bernstein）的分析师警告说，Pop Mart International Group Ltd.第四季度的业绩可能令人失望之后，该公司在香港的股价下滑。【原文：Shares of Pop Mart International Group Ltd. slipped in Hong Kong after analysts at Bernstein warned that the Labubu-maker’s fourth-quarter results could be a disappointment.】

item.title: 摩根大通推出存款代币 JPM Coin 以推动数字资产发展
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPM Chase & Co.）已开始向机构客户推出一种名为 "摩根大通币"（JPM Coin）的存款代币，此举是随着金融机构不断扩大其在数字资产领域的足迹而采取的。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has started rolling out a deposit token called JPM Coin to institutional clients, a move that comes as financial institutions continue to broaden their footprint in digital assets.】

item.title: 中国加大力度进口被列入黑名单的俄罗斯液化天然气
item.description: 中国正在加紧努力进口美国批准的俄罗斯天然气，并开始建立一支国内 "影子船队"，可以运输超冷燃料，规避对克里姆林宫旗舰产业之一的限制。【原文：China is stepping up its efforts to import US-sanctioned Russian gas, building the beginnings of a domestic “shadow fleet” of vessels that can transport the super-cooled fuel and circumvent restrictions imposed on one of the Kremlin’s flagship industries.】

item.title: 中国人民银行改变政策初衷，高盛认为宽松政策暂停期将延长
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）等全球贷款机构收回了今年在中国采取进一步货币刺激措施的呼吁，因为中国央行发出了更多耐心引导经济实现增长目标的信号。【原文：Global lenders like Goldman Sachs Group Inc. retracted calls for further monetary stimulus in China this year after the central bank telegraphed more patience in steering an economy still on track to hit growth targets.】

item.title: 策略飙升 52%，Two Sigma跻身中国对冲基金精英行列
item.description: Two Sigma Investments 在中国管理的资产首次超过 100 亿元人民币（14 亿美元），强劲的回报吸引了富有的投资者，使该公司跻身中国精英对冲基金之列。【原文：Two Sigma Investments’s assets under management in China swelled to more than 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) for the first time, as strong returns lured wealthy investors and vaulted the firm to a spot among the country’s elite hedge funds.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔称人工智能将改变经济 尽管结果各不相同
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔说，尽管人工智能将改变经济，但其结果会有多种多样。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said although artificial intelligence will transform economies, there are a range of outcomes as to how that will play out.】

item.title: 美国关税和成本影响盈利，东洋轮胎业绩下滑
item.description: 受美国关税和原材料成本上升的影响，东洋轮胎公司第三季度营业利润不及预期，股价暴跌。东洋轮胎在东京的股价下跌了 6.2%。【原文：Toyo Tire Corp. shares plunged after third-quarter operating profit missed estimates, weighed by US tariffs and higher raw material costs. Shares fell as much as 6.2% in Tokyo.】

item.title: 报告称越南在升级前考虑卖空方案
item.description: 越南正在权衡最快于明年允许规范卖空的计划，这一举措旨在促进交易量，因为越南正准备升级为新兴市场国家。【原文：Vietnam is weighing plans to allow regulated short selling as soon as next year, a step aimed at boosting trading volumes as the country prepares for an upgrade to emerging-market status.】

item.title: 供应担忧继续支撑铝价上涨
item.description: 铝连续第四个交易日上涨，原因是人们继续担心这种用途最广泛的有色金属的全球供应问题。【原文：Aluminum rose for a fourth straight day on continued concern about global supplies of the most widely used non-ferrous metal.】

item.title: 继 Lenskart 首秀乏善可陈之后，Groww IPO 将考验印度投资者的胃口
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Groww 母公司 7.52 亿美元首次公开募股后将在孟买上市交易
item.description: 印度顶级折扣经纪商 Groww 的母公司 Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd. 在首次公开募股中募集到 7.52 亿美元后，将于周三开始交易，这是继 Lenskart Solutions Ltd. 本周早些时候上市不力之后，备受关注的首次公开募股。【原文：Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd., the parent of India’s top discount broker Groww, will start trading on Wednesday after raising $752 million in its initial public offering, marking a closely watched debut following Lenskart Solutions Ltd.’s weak listing earlier this week.】

item.title: 美国上市电子商务平台唯品会被指考虑赴港上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国折扣在线零售商唯品会控股有限公司正在考虑最快于明年在香港上市。【原文：Chinese discount online retailer Vipshop Holdings Ltd. is considering a listing in Hong Kong as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 清水分析公司收到收购意向后考虑出售资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc.【原文：Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc. is considering a potential sale after receiving takeover interest, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司以 24% 的折扣定价 28 亿美元供股
item.description: 阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）以 24% 的折扣向现有股东发行股票进行供股，旨在筹集 2,493 亿卢比（28 亿美元）。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. offered stock to existing shareholders at a 24% discount for a rights issuance that aims to raise 249.3 billion rupees ($2.8 billion).】

item.title: 美国加征关税，印度央行保护货币和债券市场
item.description: 由于美国迟迟不降低苛刻的关税，损害了当地资产，印度央行正在为货币和债券市场提供支持。【原文：India’s central bank is supporting the currency and bond markets as delays in reducing harsh US tariffs hurt local assets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚住房贷款飙升至历史新高，证明澳大利亚央行暂停政策是正确的
item.description: 澳大利亚房屋贷款在第三季度超预期飙升，创下历史新高，凸显了宽松的货币政策如何重振信贷增长和房地产需求，也给储备银行提供了另一个保持观望的理由。【原文：Australian home loans surged beyond expectations in the third quarter to a record high, underscoring how easier monetary policy has reignited credit growth and property demand and giving the Reserve Bank another reason to stay on the sidelines.】

item.title: Menulog 关闭澳大利亚食品配送部门，120 个工作岗位受冲击
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com 以 "严峻的形势 "为由，在二十年后关闭了其在澳大利亚的 Menulog 订餐服务。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com is shutting down its Menulog food ordering service in Australia after two decades, citing “challenging circumstances.”】

item.title: 日本七大银行考虑投资 FamilyMart 卡关联公司
item.description: Seven Bank Ltd.总裁表示，该公司正在考虑投资一家隶属于 FamilyMart Co.【原文：Seven Bank Ltd. is considering investing in a FamilyMart Co.-affiliated credit card company and is in discussions to do so, according to the Japanese lender’s president.】

item.title: 软银出售英伟达引发人工智能市场恐慌 股价大跌
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）退出人工智能行业领头羊英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ），令已经对科技行业估值攀升感到紧张的投资者感到恐慌，该公司股价下滑达 10%。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s stock slid as much as 10% after the tech investor’s exit from AI sector leader Nvidia Corp. spooked investors already nervous about climbing tech sector valuations.】

item.title: 新世界与外国投资者的谈判因特许权问题陷入僵局
item.description: 亿万富翁郑氏家族与新世界发展有限公司潜在投资者之间的谈判陷入僵局，凸显了这家负债累累的公司在寻求急需资金时所面临的挑战。【原文：Talks between the billionaire Cheng family and potential investors in New World Development Co. are stalling, underscoring the challenges facing the indebted company as it seeks to secure much-needed funding.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警告市场对地缘政治风险上升感到自满
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行的一位高级官员警告说，在全球金融体系出现分崩离析的早期迹象之际，市场可能低估了地缘政治和宏观经济风险。【原文：A senior Reserve Bank of Australia official warned that markets may be underestimating geopolitical and macroeconomic risks at a time when the global financial system is showing early signs of fragmentation.】

item.title: 就业忧虑助推美联储减息押注，节后国债反弹
item.description: 随着现货市场交易在假期后恢复，国债反弹，交易员们认为，在一份疲软的民间就业报告公布后，美联储在 12 月份降息的可能性增加。【原文：Treasuries rallied as trading in the cash market resumed after a holiday, with traders pricing in a higher chance of a Federal Reserve rate cut in December following a weak private payrolls report.】

item.title: 美国就业数据疲软引发降息前景，黄金走高
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了疲软的就业数据和即将重启的美国政府，黄金走高，巩固了连续三天的涨势。【原文：Gold edged higher, consolidating three days of gains, as traders weighed weak jobs data and the imminent restart of the US government.】

item.title: 特朗普计划与杰米-戴蒙及华尔街高管共进晚餐
item.description: 据两位熟悉计划的官员透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周三在白宫宴请金融业高管。【原文：President Donald Trump will host financial industry executives for dinner Wednesday at the White House, according to two officials familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 备受瞩目的攻击事件发生后，英国计划出台期待已久的网络法案
item.description: 英国政府将于本周三出台一项期待已久的新法律，以加强国家对破坏性网络攻击的防御能力，这些攻击已给英国经济造成数十亿英镑的损失。【原文：The UK government is slated to introduce a long-awaited new law on Wednesday to strengthen the country’s defenses against disruptive cyberattacks that have cost the British economy billions of pounds.】

item.title: 南非迎来 "转折点"，税收意外之财推动预算增长
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）带着罕见的乐观情绪和为国家长期受限的公共财政带来转机的机会，开始了他的最新预算案。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana is heading into his latest budget with a rare sense of optimism — and the chance to mark a turning point for the nation’s long-strained public finances.】

item.title: 经济学家质疑英国失业率上升引发市场震荡
item.description: 经济学家和政策制定者警告说，英国劳动力市场的疲软很可能被夸大了，因为新的数据改变了威斯敏斯特和金融市场在预算公布前的看法。【原文：The weakness in the UK labor market is likely to have been overstated, economists and policymakers warned, after new figures shifted the narrative in Westminster and financial markets ahead of the budget.】
